title: Sago and Urad Dal Cereal Recipe for Babies - Urad Dal Porridge for babies
content:
Nutritious and protein-rich homemade healthy mix for your babies. This baby food is excellent for weight gain in babies.

This recipe is a healthy protein cereal mix for baby. It has sago and urad dal which helps in weight gaining in babies. Urad dal is high in protein and sago has carbohydrates that are good for babies. You can feed this to babies above 7 months.

 

Sago Urad Dal Cereal for Babies

 Prep time

10 mins

 

Cook time

10 mins

 

Total time

20 mins

 

Recipe type: Baby Food

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 cup

 

Ingredients

Whole Urad dal - ½ cup

Sago / Sabudana - ½ cup

 

FOR MAKING PORRIDGE:

Sago Urad dal Mix - 1 tablespoon

Water - ¼ cup

Salt or Sweetener as needed

Ghee - ½ tablespoon

 

Instructions

Dry roast sago in a pan till golden. Take it in a blender.

Wash urad dal and dry it completely. Dry roast till golden. Take it in a blender.

Powder fine., Set aside in a container.

When making porridge, take a tablespoon of the mix, add some water and cook till thickens and cooked,

Add salt and ghee and mix well.

Feed your baby.
